messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} hits you for {Damage} points of annihilative damage!

Summon_Portal.display_help: Black Swan summons portals to Shadow Earth, allowing nether energies to permeate the area. Note that Summon Portal is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Nether_Vortex.display_help: Black Swan summons portals to Shadow Earth, allowing nether energies to permeate the area. Note that Nether Vortex is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow

Mistress_of_Shadows.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

Umbral_Embrace.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
Black Swan feeds off of the Nether energies attached to you, healing her!

Maw_of_Despair.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Quills_of_Jocas.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Note that Quills of Jocas is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Quills_of_Jocas.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.
Quills_of_Jocas.display_attacker_attack_floater: The Quills of Jocas siphon Incarnate power!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Fling your quills all around you and impale {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of lethal damage!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} impales you with the {PowerName} for {Damage} points of lethal damage!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Throw_Quills.display_help: You can throw dozens of Spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Spine throwing deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Note that Throw Quills is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworld and Smite your foe with a powerful blow. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High. Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High. Recharge: Moderate
Life_Drain.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Shadowy_Binds.display_help: You take control of your victim's shadow causing it to entangle and bind its owner thus leaving them immobilized and suffering from negative energy damage over time and reducing their chance to hit. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Shadowy_Binds.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Shadowy_Binds.display_target_help: You have been entangled by Shadowy Binds and have been left immobilized.

Dark_Grasp.display_help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering from moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Dark_Grasp.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Dark_Grasp.display_target_help: The Penumbral Grasp has stopped you in your tracks!

Living_Shadows.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly

Initial.display_help: You call forth a powerful stream of lightning from the highest reaches of the atmosphere. This Flow Lightning causes significant energy damage to all enemies caught in its field, as well as drains endurance and lowers recovery.

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You quickly strike your opponent from a defensive position, causing smashing damage. The force of the blow also has a chance to slow their response time. Additionally, your chance to hit and your defense against melee and smashing attacks is increased for a short time.

Taunt.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Slow

Polar_Lights_Core_Superior_Ally.display_help:
Draws forth the essences of a vanquished Polaris and Australis from the Well of the Furies to serve you for 5 minutes. These essences do increased damage compared to their previous versions.

This power also applies an Incarnate Shift. (An Incarnate Shift is a Level Shift which only activates while participating in an Incarnate Trial.)
Polar_Lights_Core_Superior_Ally.display_short_help: Summon Polar Lights Boss & LT Essences

Barrier_Invocation.display_help: PBAoE Ally +DEF(All), +Res(All). Recharge: Very Long. The continuing buffs from this power will gradually lose effectiveness over time before they expire completely after 60 seconds.

Damage_MN.display_help: The Talons of Vengeance are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

Leader_of_the_Pack.display_help: When not in combat, Shadowhunter aggressively summons many more beasts, attempting to overwhelm his opponents.

Grasp_of_the_Beyond.display_help: Shadowhunter seeks to drag those near him into the Shadow Realm as he feels his own death draw imminent. The closer he is to death, the harder it is for nearby players to heal.

Transform.display_help: When Pendragon reaches 100 Rage, he taps into the power of the Fae realm, granting him protection from damage and empowering his sword with Mystic energies.

While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].

Guarded_Spin.display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal damage briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Guarded_Spin.display_target_help: Your Guarded Spin has increased your defense moderately.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal High Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Innocuous_Strikes.display_help: You repeatedly batter your foes' feet and legs with a flurry of sweeps of your staff. This attack deals Moderate Smashing damage to all foes within its cone. All affected targets will have their movement speed reduced, with a chance of being immobilized briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Innocuous_Strikes.display_short_help: Melee Cone, High DMG(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Speed
Innocuous_Strikes.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage [CRITICAL].

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Sky_Splitter.display_help: You leap into the air and hammer your foe with an overhead bash from your staff. Sky Splitter deals Extreme Smashing damage, will knock the target off their feet and leave them held briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and grant the user a bonus to damage resistance a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and boost the user's chance to hit for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and increase the user's regeneration and recovery rate briefly. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Sky_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient, Consumes Perfection

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel negative energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. This energy drains your target's life force and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's regeneration, chance to hit and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed.
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: Your damage potential, chance to hit and regeneration rate have been reduced.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} captures you within a {PowerName}, reducing your damage, chance to hit and regeneration rate.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.

Beam_Sweep.display_help: The Olympian Guard are capable of firing a concentrated beam of energy from their visor. This beam causes high damage and reduces the target's defense. Note that Beam Sweep is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow
Beam_Sweep.display_target_help: You are burning. Either your attack power or your support power has been decreased.
Beam_Sweep.display_attacker_attack_floater: Tyrant's beams sweep in front of him!

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Laser_Beam_Eyes.display_help: Tyrant can emit laser beams from his eyes that explode on impact. Recharge: Moderate

Jab.display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Hand_Clap.display_help: You can clap your hands together with such force that you create a deafening shockwave. This shockwave can knock back nearby foes, and they have a chance to become Disoriented due to the shock to the inner ear. Hand Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

Zeus_Lightning_Tell.display_help: Statesman can call upon the power of Zeus in time of need. Recharge: Slow

Zeus_Lightning_Bolt.display_help: Statesman can call upon the power of Zeus in time of need. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of energy damage!

Energy_Smash.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You strike your target with a powerful lightning bolt from the sky, dealing energy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Recharge: Slow
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Recovery has been reduced and your Endurance is being drained.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} drains some of your Endurance!

Temp_Invulnerability.display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Long
Temp_Invulnerability.display_target_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long
Temp_Invulnerability.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Resist_Physical_Damage.display_help: You are naturally tough and inherently resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage as well as Defense Debuff effects. This power is always on, and costs no Endurance.

Resist_Elements.display_help: You are naturally resistant to the elements and always take less Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. You are also resistant to Slow effects. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Unyielding.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to all damage but Psionics, as well as Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects.
Unyielding.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics; Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize)
Unyielding.display_attacker_hit: You now resist, Knockback, Disorientation, and all damage but Psionics with your {PowerName}, but your Defense is reduced.

Resist_Energies.display_help: You are naturally resistant to Energy and Negative Energy damage, as well as Debuff effects which reduce your endurance or recovery. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Tough_Hide.display_help: Your thickened skin makes you much tougher to hit and resistant to Defense Debuff effects. This power is always on and costs no Endurance. Tough Hide offers no protection to Psionic Attacks.

Power_of_Tartarus.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High. Recharge: Slow
Power_of_Tartarus.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Power_of_Tartarus.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You drain {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of negative energy damage and reduce their chance to hit!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} drains you for {Damage} points of negative energy damage and reduces your chance to hit!

Favor_of_the_Well.display_help: The Well protects Tyrant as his health gets low

Summon_Beams_Auto.display_help: Black Swan summons portals to Shadow Earth, allowing nether energies to permeate the area.

Olympian_Guards.display_help: Black Swan summons portals to Shadow Earth, allowing nether energies to permeate the area.

Revoke_Guards.display_help: When Tyrant goes below 40% health, Olympian Guards stop reinforcing him. Recharge: Slow

Umbral_Gaze.display_help: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Umbral_Gaze.display_short_help: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback
